name: eLeaktric
description:
Game created during Nordic Game Jam 2016 with theme LEAK!

Controls:

'Left arrow' - move bucket to the left

'Right arrow' - move bucket to the right

The objective of the game is to get the highest score possible. Points are assigned based on how long the game was played, and how many drops were caught. The game ends when water level reaches the energy/score meter.

To fully experience the game a special controller is necessary, This special controller would electrocute the player when water level rises enough to touch any of the cords. The most painful electrocution is triggered when water reaches it's maximum level.
